mapper.select: SELECT (select count(*) from member) as member_number, (select count(*) from class) as class_number, (select count(*) from (SELECT * FROM class WHERE CLASS_TERMIN = 'C')) as close_class_number from dual
SELECT member_name, member_email, member_id,member_type, TO_CHAR(member_regdate,'YYYY/MM/DD') as member_regdate from member
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET MEMBER_PASSWORD = #{member_password},MEMBER_BIRTH = #{member_birth}, MEMBER_PHONE = #{member_phone} WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{member_email}
UPDATE class SET class_termin = 'Y' WHERE seq = #{seq}
